posts.post_content:
I am going to keep one and sell/trade the other.  I don't care which one I keep.  I'm selling them for what I paid + $4 shipping

Evers Cubs was purchased in a Sterling auction for $238.  I will take $242 delivered.

[url]https://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=42797[/url]

[IMG]https://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/ItemImages/000042/42797a_lg.jpeg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/ItemImages/000042/42797b_lg.jpeg[/IMG]

Evers Chicago was purchased in a JVSC auction for $170.  I will take $174 delivered.  

[url]http://www.jvscauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=38415[/url]

[IMG]http://www.jvscauctions.com/ItemImages/000038/LY186_1012_lg.jpeg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.jvscauctions.com/ItemImages/000038/LY186T1012_lg.jpeg[/IMG]

Also willing to trade, but my trade wants are very specific.  Looking for other T206 HOFers with the same eye appeal.  
Looking for very high grade '75 or '76 Topps baseball lots.
Prices listed are net to me.
